DOC.criteria: Written inform consent Age equal 50 80 year Subjects normal glucose tolerance confirm glucose tolerance test ( control group ) patient type 2 diabetes : diabetes duration 525 year ; HbA1c equal 6.5 9 % ( diabetes group ) Ability understand follow studyrelated instruction DME hsCRP > 10 mg/dl Acute infection Acute chronic inflammatory disease Immune diseases Treatment immune suppressive drug Treatment glucocorticoid Myocardial infarction stroke within 1 year inclusion Hemorrhage within previous 5 year Surgeries within previous 3 month Oncological disease Women pregnant breastfeed
